description: The ISY skill allows you to control your ISY home-automation controller from Universal Devices. This enables you to control your devices, scenes and even programs from your Echo. To use this skill, you need to have an account on ISY Portal the full instructions for which can be found here.
imageAltText: ISY Optimized for Smart Home icon
name: ISY Optimized for Smart Home
shortDescription: Voice control your ISY devices, scenes, and even programs!
